pages.text: The $(item)Arcane Forge$() will allow me to forge my very own $(marked)Thaumagral$(), a weapon attuned to magic. $(br)In order to craft one, I'll need four components: $(br)-A Blade$(br)-A Handle$(br)-A Core$(br)-Engravings.
